Name: Folk Hero
Description: You come from a humble background, and your heroic deeds have made you a folk hero in your community. You might have performed a great act of bravery, stood up against injustice, or protected your village from a threat. Regardless of the specifics, you are celebrated as a champion of the common people.

Equipment.1: a set of artisan's tools (one of your choice)

Feature.Rustic Hospitality: Since you come from the ranks of the common folk, you fit in among them with ease. You can find a place to hide, rest, or recuperate among other commoners, unless you have shown yourself to be a danger to them. They will shield you from the law or anyone else searching for you, though they will not risk their lives for you.

Variant.Defender of the People: Your heroic deeds have earned you the respect and admiration of the common folk. You have become a symbol of hope and protection for them. They look up to you as their champion and are more willing to help you in your endeavors.

Defining Event.1: I stood up to a tyrant's agents.
Defining Event.2: I saved people during a natural disaster.
Defining Event.3: I stood alone against a terrible monster.
Defining Event.4: I stole from a corrupt merchant to help the poor.
Defining Event.5: I led a militia to fight off an invading army.
Defining Event.6: I broke into a tyrant's castle and stole weapons to arm the people.

Personality Trait.1: I judge people by their actions, not their words.
Personality Trait.2: If someone is in trouble, I'm always ready to lend help.
Personality Trait.3: When I set my mind to something, I follow through no matter what gets in my way.
Personality Trait.4: I have a strong sense of fair play and always try to find the most equitable solution to conflicts.
Personality Trait.5: I'm confident in my own abilities and do what I can to instill confidence in others.
Personality Trait.6: Thinking is for other people. I prefer action.

Ideal.1: Respect. People deserve to be treated with dignity and respect. (Good)
Ideal.2: Fairness. No one should get preferential treatment before the law, and no one is above the law. (Lawful)
Ideal.3: Freedom. Tyrants must not be allowed to oppress the people. (Chaotic)
Ideal.4: Might. If I become strong, I can take what I wantâ€”what I deserve. (Evil)
Ideal.5: Sincerity. There's no good in pretending to be something I'm not. (Neutral)
Ideal.6: Destiny. Nothing and no one can steer me away from my higher calling. (Any)

Bond.1: I have a family, but I have no idea where they are. One day, I hope to see them again.
Bond.2: I worked the land, I love the land, and I will protect the land.
Bond.3: A proud noble once gave me a horrible beating, and I will take my revenge on any bully I encounter.
Bond.4: My tools are symbols of my past life, and I carry them so that I will never forget my roots.
Bond.5: I protect those who cannot protect themselves.
Bond.6: I wish my childhood sweetheart had come with me to pursue my destiny.

Flaw.1: The tyrant who rules my land will stop at nothing to see me killed.
Flaw.2: I'm convinced of the significance of my destiny, and blind to my shortcomings and the risk of failure.
Flaw.3: The people who knew me when I was young know my shameful secret, so I can never go home again.
Flaw.4: I have a weakness for the vices of the city, especially hard drink.
Flaw.5: Secretly, I believe that things would be better if I were a tyrant lording over the land.
Flaw.6: I have trouble trusting in my allies.
